short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Version of 'Jobs DONE!' Chrome extension (from bugraalbayrak) for Red Hat Jira. Plays 'Jobs DONE' sound for completed Jira issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Would you like to feel a sense of accomplishment after completing Jira issues? Consider this a virtual pat on the back: a job (well) done!
